1.Title: Kindred Flames
1.Description: Increases the limit of <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> from 100 to 140. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice accumulates an additional 40 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. Increases the DMG Multiplier of the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect by 100% of Burnice's ATK. Additionally, the accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is increased by 25%.
1.Lore:
"Everyone has rough times; it's perfectly normal!"
"Cheer up, Caesar! How about a Nitro-Fuel special? I added a ton of sugar!"

2.Title: Extra at No Additional Charge
2.Description: When triggering the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color> is applied to the enemy, stacking up to 5 times and lasting 6s. Repeated triggers reset the duration. When any allied unit in the squad hits the enemy, the attack's PEN Ratio is increased by 4% for each stack of <color=#FFFFFF>Thermal Penetration</color>, up to a max of 20%.
2.Lore:
As the mixologist for the Sons of Calydon, Burnice takes great pleasure in crafting the best Nitro-Fuel drinks in New Eridu for her friends.
Of course, if you happen to be her enemy... you might have the opportunity to try a new and unique flavor too.
"It's a once-in-a-lifetime, absolutely exquisite taste!"

3.Title: Optimistic by Nature
3.Lore:
"That Burnice, she's always so full of energy! Even right after waking up! I have no idea where she gets all that energy..."
"What's even scarier is that she can get everyone around her to be just as enthusiastic! It's almost like she's some kind of monster!"
"But... I don't really dislike it, to be honest..."
— From a boar manager who wishes to remain unnamed

4.Title: Ultimate Fuel Supply
4.Description: When an <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> hits an enemy, the move's CRIT Rate increases by 30%. The max flame spray duration of <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> is increased by 1s.
4.Lore:
"You like the drink I mixed? Thanks! Steeltusk likes them too~ That guy can drink 200 liters in one go!"
"Oh, Steeltusk is our big truck!"
"Wanna try some of its special fuel? It's pretty fiery~"

5.Title: Dance of Fire and Ice
5.Lore:
When mixing drinks, ice is a crucial element.
Without an intense chill, the intense heat just doesn't stand out.
"That fusion of fire and ice~ It's truly captivating!"

6.Title: Burning Invitation
6.Description: When Burnice hits an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, it triggers an additional special <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, dealing 60% of Burnice's ATK as <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> to the target. This effect can trigger once every 0.5s and does not consume <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>. After hitting an enemy with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, while the move is active, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, special <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effects, and <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effects will ignore 25% of the target's <color=#FF5521>Fire RES</color>. When <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>'s fire blast hits an enemy, if that enemy is <color=#FF5521>Burned</color>, trigger an additional instance of <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> DMG equal to 1,800% of the original DMG. This effect can trigger once every 20s for each target.
6.Lore:
It seems like no one has ever seen Burnice truly angry.
"Trust me, you don't want to see it."
— From a driver getting ready to sleep atop Steeltusk

DescriptionByLevel.1:
When Burnice expends Energy, she accumulates <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, up to a max of 100. She gains 1.4 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> for each 1 point of Energy consumed. At 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>, she enters the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state until all <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> is expended. Upon entering the battlefield, Burnice instantly accumulates 100 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
While in the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, when Burnice hits an enemy with a <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack: Fuel-Fed Flame</color>, or <color=#FFFFFF>Ultimate: Glorious Inferno</color>, she applies the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> effect to the target until she exits the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state. When other squad members hit enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Scorched</color> status, it triggers the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect, expending 8 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color> to deal <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>175%</color> of Burnice's ATK and accumulate <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color>. This effect can trigger once every 1.5s. For every 10 Anomaly Proficiency, <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> DMG increases by 1%, up to a max of 30%. DMG from the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is considered <color=#FFFFFF>Assist Attack</color> DMG.

MathSkill.Title: Additional Ability: Fire Kindling
MathSkill.Description:
When another character in your squad is an <color=#FFFFFF>Anomaly</color> character or shares the same Faction:
When Burnice's <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend</color>, <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color> or <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color> hits an enemy, or when the <color=#FFFFFF>Afterburn</color> effect is triggered, the move's accumulated <color=#FF5521>Fire Anomaly Buildup</color> increases by 65%. When any squad member applies the <color=#FF5521>Burn</color> effect to an enemy, the duration of that effect is extended by 3s.

117100001.Title: Basic Attack: Direct Flame Blend
117100001.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to 5 attacks in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

117100002.Title: Basic Attack: Mixed Flame Blend
117100002.Description:
In the <color=#FFFFFF>Nitro-Fuel Cocktail</color> state, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Spin continuously while spraying flames around, followed by a Finishing Move that inflicts <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Continuing to hold extends the flame-spraying duration.
When the move is activated, it consumes 20 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>;
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.
After executing the Finishing Move, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

117100003.Title: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method
117100003.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Unleash a fire blast forward, inflicting <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>;
Press and hold <IconMap:Icon_Special> to charge, boosting the move's power.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

117100004.Title: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method
117100004.Description:
With enough energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Continuously spray flames with a one-handed flamethrower, then release a fire blast in a straight line ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Continue holding to steadily consume energy and extend the spray's duration.
While continuously spraying, drag the {LAYOUT_CONSOLECONTROLLER#stick}{LAYOUT_FALLBACK#joystick} to execute a sidestep dodge, adjusting your position in the corresponding direction.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while continuously spraying, and DMG taken is reduced by 40%.
Character is invulnerable during sidestep dodge and fire blast.

117100005.Title: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot
117100005.Description:
While using <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method</color>, with enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Use both flamethrowers to continuously spray flames, followed by a fire blast in a front line, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>. Keep holding to continue consuming Energy and extend the spray's duration.
Character is invulnerable during the moment the spray is activated and during the activation of the fire blast.
Anti-Interrupt Level is increased while spraying, and DMG received is reduced by 40%.

117100031.Title: Special Attack: Intense Heat Aging Method

117100036.Title: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method

117100044.Title: EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot

117100006.Title: Dodge: Fiery Phantom Dash
117100006.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

117100007.Title: Dash Attack: Dangerous Fermentation
117100007.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Perform a forward rush attack with the flamethrower, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.

117100008.Title: Dodge Counter: Fluttering Steps
117100008.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Launch a series of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

117100009.Title: Chain Attack: Fuel-Fed Flame
117100009.Description:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Quickly dash forward while spraying flames in all directions, then launch a fire blast in a fan-shaped area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.

117100010.Title: Ultimate: Glorious Inferno
117100010.Description:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Dash forward quickly, then leap into the air and continuously spray flames over a wide area ahead, dealing massive <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
When leaping into the air, a <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> will be triggered. If the <color=#FFFFFF>Quick Assist</color> is activated, Burnice will extend the duration of her flame spray.
Upon activation, recover 50 <color=#FFFFFF>Heat</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

117100012.Title: Quick Assist: Energizing Specialty Drink
117100012.Description:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Unleash a flurry of attacks on enemies in front while spraying flames, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color> and <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

117100013.Title: Defensive Assist: Smoky Cauldron
117100013.Description:
When the character on field is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

117100014.Title: Assist Follow-Up: Scorching Dew
117100014.Description:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Leap into the air and quickly spin forward while spraying flames in all directions, dealing <color=#FF5521>Fire DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using the skill, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to immediately follow up with <color=#FFFFFF>EX Special Attack: Intense Heat Stirring Method - Double Shot</color>.
